interest: Vector borne diseasesGeospatial healthBayesian statisticsUse of information technology in enhancing public health services
ANU.biography: I am a spatial epidemiologist with medical training. I studied M.Sc in Tropical Medicine from the Faculty of Tropical Medicine, Mahidol University, Thailand and PhD from ANU, Australia.
project: Tropical partnerships to strengthen health systems responses to infectious diseases threats
